alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 3:54PM MDT until April 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SUNDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, locally up to 2 inches near Wendover. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight Sunday night to 6 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible, especially for SR-196 from I-80 to Dugway and SR-199 from Dugway to the Rush Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
